passage: In her two major series "Memory Test" and "Autobiography," painter Howardena Pindell explored themes ______ blank healing, self-discovery, and memory by cutting and sewing back together pieces of canvas and inserting personal artifacts, such as postcards, into some of the paintings.
question_text: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English?

answer_rationales.A: Choice A is the best answer. The convention being tested is punctuation between a preposition and its complement. No punctuation is needed between the preposition "of" and its complement, the noun phrase "healing, self-discovery, and memory."
answer_rationales.B: Choice B is incorrect because no punctuation is needed between a preposition and its complement.
answer_rationales.C: Choice C is incorrect because no punctuation is needed between a preposition and its complement.
answer_rationales.D: Choice D is incorrect because no punctuation is needed between a preposition and its complement.
